## Env.newVar() method

Get the config of a new non-environment dependent variable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static newVar(name: string, config: EnvCustomConfig): EnvVar;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the new var |
|  config | EnvCustomConfig | Custom env config |

<b>Returns:</b>

[EnvVar](./subito-lib.envvar.md)
